alert.note: Alert for Alpena; Presque Isle (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Alpena and southeastern Presque Isle Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lachine, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cathro around 520 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Alpena and Lakewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
